title: Tried to install the deb file and got "Package libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 is not installed."
author: HaoliangXu

comments.body:
This lib should have been installed by default on Ubuntu. Just search the lib using this command and install the appropriate version & it should work after that.

```
sudo apt search libwebkit2gt
```
It's already installed but in a different version which is 4.1-0. But when I install dockyard, it needs 4.0-37.

title: feat: use connect_with_defaults instead of connect_with_socket_defaults
body: This allows for easier connection with alternative runtimes like podman by respecting the DOCKER_HOST environment variable. In case of its absence, bollard does a standard fallback like connect_with_socket_defaults does as well, retaining the previous functionality.
author: curtisy1

title: Apply theme based styles to toast
body: Not all of the accents look great, IMHO -- acid for example. We could base the bar on type if you prefer (each theme defines bg-success/error/info/warning also), see previous commit for that option.
author: EldritchPlatypoctopus

comments.body:
> Not all of the accents look great, IMHO -- acid for example. We could base the bar on type if you prefer (each theme defines bg-success/error/info/warning also), see previous commit for that option.

I think that will be more appropriate.
I don't think patternfly/react-core package is required as only log-viewer is used that is independent package.

Then, You should include it in dev-dependencies. 
this is causing a issue in dev-environment.

I think you better once delete your node_modules and start again
